title: FeatureHasher and DictVectorizer Comparison
description: In this lab, we will explore text vectorization, which is the process of representing non-numerical input data (such as dictionaries or text documents) as vectors of real numbers. We will compare two methods, `FeatureHasher` and `DictVectorizer`, by using both methods to vectorize text documents that are preprocessed (tokenized) with the help of a custom Python function.
